name: Vaporwave
description: Sample-based, involves heavily synthesized and processed manipulation of corporate mood and background (elevator) music; though source material can also include genres such as Pop, Contemporary R&B, and Synth Funk.

children.name: Broken Transmission
children.description: Manipulates samples from TV broadcasts, advertisements, film, radio, and other sources.

children.name: Eccojams
children.description: Simple, prototypical Vaporwave style, heavily influenced by Chopped and Screwed and Glitch, that features short, slowed-down, lyric focused, sampled loops smothered in reverb and continuously repeated, usually taken from late 20th century music.

children.name: Mallsoft
children.description: Blends the main characteristics of Vaporwave with what can be described as background/elevator music.

children.name: Slushwave
children.description: Utilizes a distinct form of sample manipulation to create a “slushy” sound, usually sequenced in soft Ambient-based soundscapes.
